description: Config-driven merge helper with Jenkins trigger support
command.openConflictFiles: Quick Merge Jenkins: Open Conflict Files
command.openMergeEditor: Quick Merge Jenkins: Open Merge Editor
command.openConfig: Quick Merge Jenkins: Open Config File
configuration.title: Quick Merge Jenkins
config.deepseekApiKey: DeepSeek API Key used to translate demand descriptions.
config.deepseekBaseUrl: DeepSeek API base URL, default includes /v1.
config.jenkinsUrl: Jenkins base URL used as a fallback for deploy-to-test.
config.jenkinsUser: Jenkins user used as a fallback for deploy-to-test.
config.jenkinsApiToken: Jenkins API token used as a fallback for deploy-to-test.
config.jenkinsProdUrl: Jenkins base URL used for prod merge page opening.
config.jenkinsProdJob: Jenkins job path used for prod merge page opening.
